item.title: Windows Forensics Tips - USB Write Protected
item.author: info@seguridadparatodos.es (Julian J Gonzalez)
item.description: Hi every one! This post I have decided write in english why? Answer is why not? In Digital Forensics it’s so important to mantain integrity of evidence, is for this reason what you need read data without any modification. Sometime you get the “evidence” and write into a USB stick, then if you have to read data into windows device, you must enable write protetection for USB device to avoid any modification of them.
